text: Ken Veevers (29 July 1909 – 13 February 1973) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood and Fitzroy in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Ken Veevers's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1909 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Fitzroy Football Club players
title: Ken Veevers
